name: Mia Allen
summary: Enthusiastic, competent, and energetic Au Pair with a level head and proven record of providing exemplary childcare assistance to families. Well-groomed and eloquent with a diplomatic demeanor. Specialized competencies include tutoring mathematics and science subjects for Elementary School children. A registered play therapist with a Bachelor's Degree in Early Childhood Development. Fluent in English, French, and German. Transported children daily with a 100% clean driving record.

experience.title: Live In Au Pair
experience.description: Received three letters of recommendation from the family, physician, and psychologist during the period caring for an autistic boy aged 11 and making a valuable contribution to his social skills by taking him to volunteer at an animal shelter once a week. Responsible for taking care of 6-year old twin girls. Prepared breakfast in the morning and packed lunch boxes with nutritious foods. Dropped the twins off at school in the mornings and fetched them in the afternoons. Drove children to ballet class twice a week and violin lessons once a week. Provided them with a mid-afternoon snack before they start their homework. Assisted with homework activities where needed. Took them to play dates during weekends. Occasionally drove the children to doctor's appointments when neither one of the parents are available. Ensured that children are fed and bathed by 7 pm in the evenings.

experience.title: Teacher Au Pair
experience.description: Assisted a ten-year-old girl by improving her overall academic performance by 45% after realizing that she has dyslexia and bringing that the parent's attention which in turn got her the professional help she needed. Helped to promote the academic, social and mental development of two children of ages 5 and 7. Provided after school tutoring in mathematics and science at the school premises. Took the children home after tutoring lessons were done. Engaged in play therapy sessions with time twice per week, and supervising free playtimes. Oversaw homework assignments and class projects. Taught the children basic Spanish and French. Prepared the evening meal for the family. Ensured that the children bathed themselves and cleaned up their rooms before dinner. Read stories to the children before bedtime.
